start.speaker: Narrator
start.text:
The air is honest here. It tells you exactly how long you have before it takes your fingers.

A scout’s warning is practical, not kind: the whiteouts have started to move against the wind.

choices.text: Accept the warning and plan your route.
Ignore it and press on anyway.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: You step into the Northern Wastes with a plan—or with pride. Either way, the cold keeps receipts.
